definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: He gazes directly into the camera, his expression a mixture of elegiac sadness and deep empathy.
sentences.chinese: 他直视镜头，表情既忧郁又凝重。

sentences.english: "Actually." He looks straight at his wife.
sentences.chinese: “说实在的，”他直视着他的妻子。

sentences.english: Michael DeBakey was a pioneer of open heart surgery , which has saved countless lives.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔是心内直视手术的开创者，救了无数人的生命。

sentences.english: It makes me feel that I can look the East End in the face.
sentences.chinese: 这使我觉得我能直视伦敦东区人。

sentences.english: Objective A method to prevent hypokalemia caused by the usage of ultrafilter during Cardiopulmonary Bypass(CPB) was found out.
sentences.chinese: 目的防治心内直视手术中应用超滤器后低血钾。

sentences.english: It was his eyes that Catherine focused on. They were a soft gray, unreadable.
sentences.chinese: 柯瑟琳直视着他的双眼，淡淡的灰色，令人难以捉摸。

sentences.english: Theinstrument structure, and its performance of the straightforward-view pen mini-spectroscopesbased on that holographic hybrid refractive-diffractive elements are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 并利用这种衍射折射色散元件构成笔式直视分光镜。

sentences.english: Conclusion Intratracheal intubation under direct vision is superior to traditional tracheotomy.
sentences.chinese: 结论直视下气管插管法优于传统的气管切开法。

sentences.english: Real macho man presume orthoptic miserably thin life.
sentences.chinese: 真正的猛男，敢于直视惨淡的人生。

sentences.english: Staring on your face reflected in a pool of water?
sentences.chinese: 直视水池中倒映出的自己的脸孔？

sentences.english: He lay there, his teeth set, his hands clenched, his eyes looking straight up.
sentences.chinese: 他躺在那儿，牙关紧闭，双拳紧握，两眼直视上方。

sentences.english: He would talk to the people, have direct eye contact.
sentences.chinese: 在与人聊天时，他会直视对方进行眼神交流。

sentences.english: It is time to leave the theater and see China for what it is.
sentences.chinese: 是时候揭开纸老虎的画皮，直视中国的真实面目。

sentences.english: I looked Gladys straight in the eye.
sentences.chinese: 我直视着格雷迪丝的眼睛。

sentences.english: Accurate tears localization with binocular indirect ophthalmoscope can increase successful rate.
sentences.chinese: 应用间接检眼镜直视下手术可大大提高手术成功率。

sentences.english: Even open heart diamond center, it will not detect any flaws.
sentences.chinese: 即便直视水钻中心，也不会察觉任何瑕疵。

definition: to look at from close up/to watch intently
to gaze at/to fix one's eyes on
to tilt one's head back to see (sth)/to look up at
to glower (at sb)/to cast an angry look
